name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Natural Language Processing**, **Machine Learning**, and **Deep Learning** solutions. Proficient in leveraging **Python**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face Transformers** to develop advanced algorithms and data pipelines capable of real-time inference. Adept at building and deploying sophisticated models, managing production workflows, and ensuring robust data processing using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Extensive background in designing and implementing **AI/ML** capabilities across enterprise-level applications, with a strong emphasis on compliance and security standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
 Experienced full stack developer with hands-on expertise in a variety of technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Successful track record in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS** and proficient in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. Committed to building impactful systems that deliver real-world results.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed data pipelines and inference engines to facilitate real-time model serving and integration for applications, ensuring efficient processing and deployment.
• Led the integration of Natural Language Processing (NLP) models, utilizing **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** for healthcare document parsing and financial anomaly detection across systems.
• Built and maintained robust ML pipelines using MLflow for model versioning and continuous training, ensuring high-quality model outputs and streamlined workflows across environments.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI-driven features into products, such as smart analytics dashboards and predictive alerts, harnessing the capabilities of advanced **deep learning** algorithms and tools.
• Worked extensively with Linux environments to deploy machine learning models, ensuring high-performance and reliable operations at scale.
• Optimized existing algorithms and models to enhance performance, achieving improvements of up to **25%** in prediction accuracy and reducing inference time by **15%**.
• Assisted in establishing best practices for maintaining code quality and model performance, promoting the adoption of efficient coding standards and technologies across the team.
• Conducted thorough testing and evaluation of models and libraries using frameworks such as **PyTest** and integrated them with RESTful APIs to ensure seamless application functionality.
• Continuously researched and implemented the latest advancements in machine learning and deep learning, staying updated with trends that influence the field.

• Developed and deployed Machine Learning models leveraging **Python** and **PyTorch** for tasks in Natural Language Processing, enhancing processing efficiency by **30%** over traditional methods.
• Created robust Data Pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Linux** environments to automate the data flow, ensuring data integrity and minimizing latency in machine learning processes, achieving a **40%** increase in data processing speed.
• Designed and implemented inference engines for real-time predictions, integrating algorithms that drove improvements in accuracy by **15%** across various ML applications.
• Leveraged **Hugging Face Transformers** for advanced NLP tasks, optimizing model performance for text classification and sentiment analysis while significantly reducing processing time by **25%**.
• Collaborated in a cross-functional team to create scalable ML solutions, focusing on code quality, version control practices, and efficient deployment strategies.
• Conducted thorough evaluations of deep learning models, employing techniques to refine algorithms and improve results before production rollout, ultimately enhancing the user experience.
• Developed comprehensive documentation and training materials for team members on ML strategies and best practices, fostering knowledge sharing and professional development.

Developed and implemented advanced **Natural Language Processing** (NLP) algorithms using **Python** with **PyTorch** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, driving improvements in text understanding and data analysis across projects.
Engineered scalable and efficient **Machine Learning** pipelines, handling datasets over **100GB** in size and optimizing model inference times by over **30%** through careful tuning and data preprocessing.
Created and maintained robust data pipelines integrated with cloud services, ensuring automated data collection and feature extraction, enabling real-time analytics for system improvements.
Designed and executed deep learning models for various applications, achieving accuracy rates over **95%** on validation datasets through continuous model updates and hyperparameter tuning.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to integrate **Machine Learning** solutions into existing systems, enhancing overall product functionality and user experience.
Utilized **Linux** environments for model deployment, ensuring high-performance computing resources and managing dependencies effectively, reducing downtime to **minimal levels**.
Researched and implemented new algorithms and models to improve prediction accuracy and processing efficiency, staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and advancements in **Machine Learning**.
Led training workshops and presentations on **Machine Learning** techniques and best practices, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous learning within the team.
